name: Melfort Rutabaga
description: Heirloom variety from New Brunswick Canada, OS Hope seeds; from friend Andrea Berry; YE Flesh, vigourous growth, uniform smooth shape ( unlike some rutabagas), good keeper.

name: Ranger summer squash
description: A strain of Yellow Crookneck with some res to PM; Holds well, Slow to get warty. 15+ seeds

name: Gorbea potato
description:
From the town of Alava in the basque region of Spain . Round tubers with very thinned yellow skin, and white pulp having high dry matter.

Quite productive, good virus resistance.
